items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement a recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history using AI algorithms.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 personalized product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to non-personalized suggestions.
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users without degradation.
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

notes: Assumed requirement is for a single recommendation feature; details on AI model type, data sources, and integration points were not provided.
